summary: Defines the data models and backend logic for the mocked AWS Inspector2 service, including account state handling, member representation, filter criteria, and operations such as enabling the service, managing organization settings, creating/deleting filters, retrieving findings, and handling resource tags.
business_intent: Provide a fully functional inâ€‘memory simulation of the Inspector2 API so developers can write and run tests against account management, member administration, filter configuration, and findings retrieval without contacting real AWS services.
